entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Erratic behavior marshaling derived classes to native code #60803
  • The "PInvokeTableGenerator" task failed unexpectedly when using `delegate*` in `[DllImport]` #60802
    6.0.1
  • [UnmanagedCallersOnly] is not supported on inner functions in Blazor #60800
    6.0.1
  • AES Decryptor gives wrong result in .NET6 compared to .NET Framework #60799
  • ReadyToRun, linux and Microsoft.WindowsDesktop.App - usability issues #60795
  • Importing .vsconfig shows an error #60794
  • AdvSimd deson't work at all on SOV39 #60792

Closed

  • Decryption fails after upgrade 6.0rc2 #60801
  • Make `mono` CSP Compliant #59416
    7.0.0
  • Blazor - Safari Ipad - RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded #59407
    7.0.0
  • System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Tests.Atom10FeedFormatterTests.Write_EmptyFeed_SerializesExpected failing in CI #59802
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Removed two unused packages #60798
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Use remainder operator in CalendricalCalculationsHelper #60796
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Split sendtohelixhelp.proj #60793
  • Initial support for partially jitted methods #60791
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: some enhancements to redundant branch opts #60732
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix small typo in MetadataVirtualMethodAlgorithm.cs #60797
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOSSimulator #58870
  • Fix typo in comment: NoPropogateInherit -> NoPropagateInherit #60717
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution

Updated

  • [hackathon] [testonly] ValueArray - a compliment type to the Span, which owns its data without indirections. #60608
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • ci arm test #60788
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • More stack overflow avoidance in regex NonBacktracking #60786
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Optimize PersianCalendar.AddMonths calculations #60778
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE][EXPERIMENT] [wasm][aot] link with O1 #60739
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Hide 'align' instruction behind jmp #60787
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Change dotnet.wasm link optimization #60632
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.1

Issues

Closed

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • False positive IDE0059 for variable captured by lambda in switch block #57344
  • Endless loop in 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal(SyntaxNode, int)' #57343
  • Roslyn projects failing to build in source-build bootstrap build #57342

Closed

  • CS8604 Null reference false positive with two nullable objects #57320

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix the assembly name used in generator identity #57341
    Area-IDE
  • Fix exception being thrown if the list of files didn't change #57340
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Fix races in tests for LspWorkspaceManager by waiting for workspace operations on creation #57339
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57332
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • List patterns: main IDE scenarios and AddRequiredParens #53850
    Area-IDE, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.1
  • Add VSTypeScriptAsynchronousTaggerProvider #57310
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Binder.CreateConversion - Report use-site diagnostics for the entire conversion hierarchy. #57175
    Area-Compilers
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • [hackathon] Support nice syntax for ValueArray in most type contexts. #57286
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove the BranchId concept from teh workspace #57132
    Area-IDE
  • Allow newlines in the holes inside interpolated strings #56853
    Area-Compilers, Compiler.Next
  • Options5 #57254
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • features/list-patterns #54864
    PR For Personal Review Only
  • Compute val escape for extended property patterns #57211
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Extended Property Patterns

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug/Proposal?] Why can't I override the BuilderRenderTree method in .razor component? #37797
  • Trivial application has non-zero CPU usage on Linux #37796
  • using AssemblyInfo.cs for "ASP.NET Core Web App" : Razor ". Views" dll gets version "0.0.0.0" #37795
  • Single file build time regression: json, json, proxy-yarp #37792
  • Is there a way to access `window` object in the Browser from Blazor Webassembly? #37790
  • Backport template typo fix to 6.0.xxx servicing #37788
    6.0.x
  • Validate CSP for Blazor WASM #37787
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • Startup regression: https, json, mapaction, mvc #37632
  • Startup improvement: fortunes_dapper #37699
  • Blazor: Compilation error for a razor file with a component receiving Cascading Type Parameter and containing a generic RenderFragment #37506
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [App-building][rc1]Error message is confusing, when there is a syntax error in razor file #37065
    7.0-preview1
  • Potential Tooling Issue (RZ code on whitespace after self closing tab) #31081
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Html Markdown in .razor file creates warnings after inserting @onclick #27474
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Merged

  • Unquarantine (most) HTTP3 tests #37756
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine `BlazorWasmHostedTemplate_AzureActiveDirectoryTemplate_Works` #37783
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Update ua-parser-js #37785
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Make tests for FileLoggerProcessor system time independent #37755
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Only dispose WindowsIdentity in LongPolling #37781
    area-signalr

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

    7.0.0
  • Use hrefs for links #26443
  • Remove tabs from T4 templates #26442
  • Is there a way to avoid EF1001 warnings without having to use every providers #26440

Closed

  • Be consistent about when/how we use <remarks> #25529
    7.0.0
  • Review internal constructors #16708
    7.0.0
  • Unneccessary schema name parameter generated in rc.2 migrations code generator #26406

PullRequests

Created

  • Check and update service lifetime docs #26445

Merged

  • Use remarks in XML docs #26439

Updated

  • [6.0.1] Query: Copy client projections when updating SelectExpression #26431
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • Query: add translation for string.IndexOf(string, int) #25396 #25655
    waiting-for-response
  • Fix to #26344 - SqlNullabilityProcessor and COALESCE with more than two arguments #26419
